title: Physical fitness post VO2max -- a computational framework
summary: This paper critically examines the conceptual and methodological limitations underlying the current understanding and application of VO2max in exercise science and physical activity prescription. Despite the establishment of WHO guidelines on physical activity, population-level adherence remains low.
